Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: "Early Years" and "Last Chapter". While giving audiences an interesting view of the complicated, poignant life of the author, it also examines the struggle between intellectual life and social beliefs held in juxtaposition against weakness, sins, business and consumerism.
